data.title: Simon Says Stamp – Cozy Hugs Release Blog Hop
data.meta_description: Hello crafty friends! Welcome to the Simon Says Stamp Cozy Hugs Release Blog Hop! Thank you for being here! Be sure to check out the Simon Says Stamp Blog where today's blog hop begins. To see all the inspiration in one place, check out the Cozy Hugs Gallery! I hope you'll see lots of amazing…
data.text:
Hello crafty friends!

Welcome to the Simon Says Stamp Cozy Hugs Release Blog Hop! Thank you for being here! Be sure to check out the Simon Says Stamp Blog where today’s blog hop begins. To see all the inspiration in one place, check out the Cozy Hugs Gallery! I hope you’ll see lots of amazing projects that will inspire you to create!

First, I want to begin by listing all the fabulous products from this release that are used for today’s card. I combined a lot – but that’s because these products are amazing together!

Layered Songbird die

Scalloped Birdhouse die

Fiddly Leaf die

Budding Branches die

Glistening Snowflakes embossing folder

Reverse Christmas Wishes sentiment strips

Holly Sparkle sequin mix

Lots of die-cutting on this card and much of it is simple die-cutting. For the background, I ink-blended and embossed a textured background. Songbirds come in a variety of colors, but I opted for pink and red.

Once all the die-cutting and ink-blending was done, it’s a matter of assembly – it’s always the best part of cardmaking for me! I embellished my card with lots of sprigs and adorned the card with some holly leaves from the Holly Sparkle sequin mix. I hope you like it! Be sure to check out the blog hop list below to see more inspiration!

SHOPPING PROMOTION:

The graphic includes our free gift with a purchase of $75 or more for the hop:

Share the code: COZY with your followers so that they can get the Giant Hugs Card Wrap die FREE with a purchase of $75 or more!

This promotion will expire 10/9 at 11:59 pm EDT.

GIVEAWAY INFORMATION:

Simon Says Stamp is giving away a $25 coupon to every stop on the hop from the blog comment section. Winners will be chosen and posted on the Simon Says Stamp blog on Wednesday the 12th of October. Winners can email Simon Says Stamp to claim his/her prize

BLOG HOP LIST:

Simon Says Stamp Blog

Thank you so much for stopping by today!
